attributes.action: free the people and their minds will follow
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: you have to be stupid to still beleive what 'humans' do is intelligence, it's stupidity, we are destroying our world and ourselves without the freedom we deserve we are judged and controlled, we as are only animals and we do not have any authority, we should be able to do pretty much what we want when we want, i don't expect to be told what to do by someone simply because he is rich or more educated, rules and regulations should be banished, we're trapped in a control freaks dream of power. without atheism and recreational drug use the 'important' people wouldn't be where they are, and now they need to learn, free the people and their minds will follow. the revolution must begin, kill the government, or at least destroy capitalism, stoners,chillers,punks, and nutters we have to unite and take down power before it destroys us and our world, f**k what they think they can do, it is technically our right to think and act as we wish, as the law is based on the commandments, and as god is non exsistent we have no laws, we are unique, we have to escape the line of conformity before it swallows us all and leads this world to hell as we know it.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
